short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display related COVID-19 restrictions, travel guide, and destination insights on Airbnb pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Travel Guide by VacationHomeRents extension will display information to enrich your Airbnb browsing experience by showing travel guides, local vacation rental rate and distributions, as well as COVID-19 travel restrictions of the destination state.
